body:
I recently did a patchrequest to fix that round trip issue #10768: https://github.com/golang/go/commit/daaa45073e887cb6d8075c2caafdfe8425bca25a (will be included in Go 1.5 afaik)

First and third example should indeed fail to parse, which doesn't happen. If I find some time I can look into it, doesn't seem hard to solve.
